post.author: Jin
post.content:
Hi,

MediaDigm Techology Inc. is looking for a graphic designer for a short term project (2 weeks) in order to tune our product GUI.

The candidate should have experience in WEB based GUI design for software product. In addition, the candidate should be able to work in office.

The contract would be hourly based in between 35 and 45 (CDN).


Thanks
Giyeong Son

gson@mediadigm.net
905-212-9780 ex) 23
post.title: Short term project for Graphic desinger
